column4: When this computer was a windows computer, sound would come through the speakers. Now the speakers are completely ignored by ubuntu, and instead sound will only come out of the headphones, assuming headphones are plugged into the headphone jack. How can I make ubuntu communicate to the speakers again?
I have no idea what that is. I'll look for it.
It's an odd-ish command line pgm. Jsut open termina. window and do a alsamixer
